scripts.cy:runFunctionalTest: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/functionalTests_spec.js' & npm run cypress:report
scripts.cy:runFunctionalTestAndCyDashboard: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/functionalTests_spec.js' --headless --record --key 3ba54c3c-5551-4750-b477-b60e0e97e630 & npm run cypress:report
scripts.cy:runVisualTest: npm run cy:percyToken && npx percy exec -- cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/visualTests_spec.js'
scripts.cy:runVisualTestAndCyDashboard: npm run cy:percyToken && npx percy exec -- cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/visualTests_spec.js' & npm run cypress:report
scripts.cy:runTestsInChrome: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome; npm run junit:merge; npm run cypress:report
scripts.cy:runCrossBrowserTesting: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox --headless --record --key 3ba54c3c-5551-4750-b477-b60e0e97e630
scripts.cy:runCrossBrowserTestingInGroups: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox --group FireFox --ci-build-id $ID & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id $ID
